00003 #ifndef zipfile_H
00004 #define zipfile_H 1
00005 
00006 #define LOC_EXTRA   6  /* extra bytes */
00007 #define LOC_COMP    8  /* compression method */
00008 #define LOC_MODTIME 10 /* last modification time */
00009 #define LOC_MODDATE 12 /* last modification date */
00010 #define LOC_CRC     14 /* CRC */
00011 #define LOC_CSIZE   18 /* compressed size */
00012 #define LOC_USIZE   22 /* uncompressed size */
00013 #define LOC_FNLEN   26 /* filename length */
00014 #define LOC_EFLEN   28 /* extra-field length */
00015 
00016 #define CEN_COMP    10 /* compression method */
00017 #define CEN_MODTIME 12
00018 #define CEN_MODDATE 14
00019 #define CEN_CRC     16
00020 #define CEN_CSIZE   20
00021 #define CEN_USIZE   24
00022 #define CEN_FNLEN   28
00023 #define CEN_EFLEN   30
00024 #define CEN_COMLEN  32
00025 #define CEN_OFFSET  42

00028 /* macros */
00029 
00030 #define PACK_UB4(d, o, v) d[o] = (ub1)((v) & 0x000000ff); \
00031                           d[o + 1] = (ub1)(((v) & 0x0000ff00) >> 8); \
00032                           d[o + 2] = (ub1)(((v) & 0x00ff0000) >> 16); \
00033                           d[o + 3] = (ub1)(((v) & 0xff000000) >> 24)
00034 
00035 #define PACK_UB2(d, o, v) d[o] = (ub1)((v) & 0x00ff); \
00036                           d[o + 1] = (ub1)(((v) & 0xff00) >> 8)
00037 
00038 #define UNPACK_UB4(s, o) (ub4)s[o] + (((ub4)s[o + 1]) << 8) +\
00039                          (((ub4)s[o + 2]) << 16) + (((ub4)s[o + 3]) << 24)
00040 
00041 #define UNPACK_UB2(s, o)  (ub2)s[o] + (((ub2)s[o + 1]) << 8)
00042 
00043 #endif
